english_translation: The moment when good is done is the auspicious time (sumuhurta) in life
The time when evil is desired is the inauspicious time (rāhukāla).

kannada_original: ಪ್ರೀತಿ ತುಂಬಿದ ಎದೆಗೆ ಇದೆಯೆ ಕಾಲದ ಪರಿವೆ ?
english_transliteration: Prīti tumbida edege ideye kālada parive?
english_translation: Does a heart filled with love have awareness of time (limitations)?
Time is far from evil – Muddu Rāma.
